description: This file implements an authentication context for a React application, providing sign-in and sign-out functionalities with localStorage persistence. It defines the AuthProvider component, a custom hook useAuth, and manages user state, tokens, and external API calls.

methods.name: AuthProvider
methods.description: React component that provides authentication context to child components, managing user and token state, persistence with localStorage, and sign-in/sign-out functionalities.

methods.name: useAuth
methods.description: Custom React hook that provides access to the authentication context.
